Package com.safety4kids.game.Screens

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GameScreen
    This Class represents the states that both level 1 and 3 inherit from.
    Instructions
    This class is the instructions screen.
    IntroAnimation
    Creates an instance of SplashScreenLogo and alter's it's alpha and x-position to draw a splash screen.
    Level1IntroScreen
    This class is the introductory screen for level 1.
    Level1Screen
    This Class represents the first level of the game where it is based on an interactive learning platformer.
    Level2IntroScreen
    This class is the introductory screen for level 2.
    Level2LoseScreen
    This class is called when the user loses level 2.
    Level2Screen
    This class plays the second level.
    Level2WinScreen
    This class is the win screen for level 2.
    Level3IntroScreen
    This class is the introductory screen for level 3.
    Level3LoseScreen
    This class is the lose screen for level 3.
    Level3Screen  
    Level3WinScreen
    This class is the win screen for level 3.
    MainMenu
    This class displays the main menu which has buttons to allow the user to visit different stages such as Instructions, first level, or exit.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GameScreen.GameState
    Different enums representing th States of the game
